text:
Use the same regular expression engine as in Apache 2.0, this would make writing
mod_security rules for both server versions nice and simple :)  I assume it
would also allow other administrators to write tidier reg exps in their apache
config files.

Thanks

Jan
creator: chs@phucknut.net

text:
Sorry, 1.3 uses the system regex, and this is highly system dependent.  2.0 uses
the PCRE Library, and this change will not be backported to 1.3 (it would break
existing 1.3 configurations, for one thing).
creator: chip@force-elite.com

text: binary compatibility would be broken as well (third-party modules would be broken)
